pr_title: DHFPROD-6143:Run OOTB ml-gradle DMSDK tasks against Final db in DHS.

timeline.bodyText: Looks like this should assert on appServicesConnectionType as well? Though is that actually required for the ml-gradle tasks to work? Those tasks will only use the appServices port if the user specifies a "-Pdatabase=". And that path doesn't always work well due to a bug in the REST API. The ml-gradle docs tell the user to override databaseClient directly as a better approach.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I have included the assert on appServicesConnectionType. It doesn't seem like we need to set appServicesConnectionType to GATEWAY for dmsdk tasks to work against final db.
replies.author: srinathgit

timeline.message: DHFPROD-6143:Run OOTB ml-gradle DMSDK tasks against Final db in DHS
